member.name: M:Piri.Framework.Scheduler.Quartz.Controllers.QuartzController.Post(Piri.Framework.Scheduler.Quartz.Domain.JobDataDto)
member.remarks: ### REMARKS ### The following codes are returned - 400 - No sub domain is found that matches the SubDomainName property - 200 - A Scheduled Job Created

member.name: M:Piri.Framework.Scheduler.Quartz.Controllers.QuartzController.Get
member.remarks: ### REMARKS ### The following codes are returned - 400 - No sub domain is found that matches the SubDomainName property - 200 - Scheduled Jobs Listed

member.name: M:Piri.Framework.Scheduler.Quartz.Controllers.QuartzController.PauseAll
member.remarks: ### REMARKS ### The following codes are returned - 400 - No sub domain is found that matches the SubDomainName property - 200 - All scheduled Jobs Paused

member.name: M:Piri.Framework.Scheduler.Quartz.Controllers.QuartzController.ResumeAll
member.remarks: ### REMARKS ### The following codes are returned - 400 - No sub domain is found that matches the SubDomainName property - 200 - All scheduled Jobs Resumed

member.name: M:Piri.Framework.Scheduler.Quartz.Controllers.QuartzController.InitializeAllJobs
member.remarks: ### REMARKS ### The following codes are returned - 400 - No sub domain is found that matches the SubDomainName property - 200 - All scheduled Jobs Initialized

member.name: M:Piri.Framework.Scheduler.Quartz.Controllers.QuartzController.InitializeJob
member.remarks: ### REMARKS ### The following codes are returned - 400 - No sub domain is found that matches the SubDomainName property - 200 - The scheduled Job Initialized

member.name: M:Piri.Framework.Scheduler.Quartz.Controllers.QuartzController.DeleteJob(System.String)
member.remarks: ### REMARKS ### The following codes are returned - 400 - No sub domain is found that matches the SubDomainName property - 200 - The scheduled Job Deleted
